biocontainers.name: rnasamba
biocontainers.summary: A tool for computing the coding potential of RNA transcript sequences using deep learning.

biotools.summary: RNAsamba is a tool for computing the coding potential of RNA sequences using a neural network classification model. It can be used to identify mRNAs and lncRNAs without relying on database searches.

bioschemas.name: RNAsamba
bioschemas.summary: RNAsamba is a tool for computing the coding potential of RNA sequences using a neural network classification model. It can be used to identify mRNAs and lncRNAs without relying on database searches.
